title: murugA enavE dinam oru muraiyEnum
sahitya:
murugA enavE dinam oru muraiyEnum manamE karudi varai enil gati peruvAi ini


anupallavi

  poruttiDa muDiyAda varuttam aDuttapOdu karuttil avanadu tirunAmattai nirutti


caraNam    nitta nittam nI ettanai nErattai vIN ettanattil pOkki Engi vIngugirAi
ettuNai allalum nillAmal nInga nI cittam kuvindiDum bhakti mighundOnga
